enchantment.astralenchant.mitigation_pie: Attacks with this item will penetrate various damage reductions.
enchantment.astralenchant.last_stand.des: Consumes experience points to avoid death.
enchantment.astralenchant.item_protectio: Protects the item's components. Note: Durability is not protected.
enchantment.astralenchant.essence_of_enc: All stats of the item increase based on the total level of all other enchantments besides this one.
enchantment.astralenchant.cooldown_reduc: Reduces the cooldown for all items, such as Shields and Ender Pearls.
Allows you to collect all destructible blocks. Components are also saved.
enchantment.astralenchant.adventurers_lo: Increases your luck based on the number of completed achievements.
Instead of bundles, enchantments will be applied to internal items, ignoring conflicts.
enchantment.astralenchant.endless_appeti: Enhances natural regeneration and directly restores an amount equal to the excess over the cap of food level and hidden saturation level.
enchantment.astralenchant.momentum.desc: Disables speed reductions caused by item usage or blocks.
enchantment.astralenchant.instant_telepo: When using an Ender Pearl, teleport to the location player is looking at. If sneaking, teleports to the other side of the blocks.
astralenchant.message.teleport.fail: No valid block exists within range!
